DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare safety efficacy daily application IDP-123 Lotion Tazorac Cream , 0.1 % , Vehicle Lotion , Vehicle Cream subject moderate severe acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Safety Efficacy IDP-123 Lotion Tazorac Cream Treatment Acne Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind , vehicle-controlled , 12-week study design assess safety , tolerability , efficacy IDP-123 Lotion comparison Tazorac Cream , Vehicle Lotion , Vehicle Cream subject moderate severe acne . Treatment success evaluate change inflammatory non-inflammatory lesion count , well treatment success use Evaluator 's Global Severity Score . IDP-123 lotion topical treatment acne .
